title: Dell COSI Driver Configuration Schema
description: this file contains JSON schema for Dell COSI Driver Configuration file

log-level.description: Defines how verbose should logs be

connections.description: List of connections based on which the sub-drivers are constructed

objectscale.description: Configuration specific to the Dell ObjectScale platform

id.description: Default, unique identifier for the sub-driver/platform

objectscale-gateway.description: Endpoint of the ObjectScale Gateway Internal service
objectscale-gateway.$comment: format field is placed here only for documentation purposes

objectstore-gateway.description: Endpoint of the ObjectScale ObjectStore Management Gateway service
objectstore-gateway.$comment: format field is placed here only for documentation purposes

region.description: IAM API specific field, points to the region in which ObjectScale system is installed

credentials.description: Credentials used for authentication to OSP

username.$comment: format field is placed here only for documentation purposes

password.$comment: format field is placed here only for documentation purposes

endpoint.description: Endpoint of the ObjectStore S3 service
endpoint.$comment: format field is placed here only for documentation purposes

insecure.description: Controls whether a client verifies the server's certificate chain and host name
